fields.name: Rosé-Merlot
fields.description: Rosé-Merlot will remind you of summer holidays at your grandparents: juicy berries, fresh ripe strawberries, smooth and soft with a refreshing finish. Enjoy it with or without food.

fields.name: Cabernet-Sauvignon
fields.description: Cabernet Sauvignon is well known for its firm tannins and full and rich taste, including such notes as blackcurrant, as well as woodsy flavors, such as cedar, oak, and herbs. The wine also contains great potential for aging, thanks to its high rate of tannins and perceptible acidity.

fields.name: Chardonnay
fields.description: Oaked Chardonnays are rich, full-bodied and have additional flavors of vanilla, butter and even caramel from the oak.

fields.name: Gift Box for Women
fields.description: Perfect idea for a birthday, anniversary or Valentines's day. Make your woman happy with a good quality wine, home made chocolate and fruits.

fields.name: Gift Box for Men
fields.description: Perfect idea for a birthday, anniversary or Valentines's day. Make your husband/father/friend happy with a good quality wine, home made chocolate and fruits.

fields.name: Gift Box
fields.description: Perfect idea for a birthday, anniversary or Valentines's day. Make your friend happy with a good quality wine, home made chocolate and fruits.

fields.name: Valentine's day gift
fields.description: Perfect red sparkling to enjoy with your second half on Valentine's day. Decorated with chocolates and petal roses.

fields.name: Merlot
fields.description: Red fruits, easy tannins and a soft finish are the characteristics of Merlot wine. But there's more to Merlot than being smooth.

fields.name: Pink Champagne
fields.description: The palate is surprisingly but pleasantly sparkling, instantly seductive and velvety.

fields.name: Moldova Red
fields.description: Moldovan red wine, homemade, fully organic.

fields.name: Mistery Red
fields.description: Explore new wines with Heredo winery. Trust us on this one, it's THE red wine.

fields.description: Explore new wines with Heredo winery. Trust us on this one, it's THE white wine.

fields.name: Mother's day gift
fields.description: It's Mother's day! Make your mother happy with a bottle of wine, handmade chocolates by Heredo and hand picked flowers from Heredo estate Herbarium
